params._contextId: ID of the context this proxy belongs to
params._owner: Address of the context configuration contract

contextStorageEntries(uint32,uint32).details: Returns a paginated list of key-value pairs from the context storage

params.limit: Maximum number of entries to return

getActiveProposalsLimit().details: Returns the maximum number of active proposals allowed per author

getConfirmationsCount(bytes32).details: Gets the number of confirmations for a specific proposal

params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to check

getContextValue(bytes).details: Retrieves a value from the context storage

params.key: The key to look up in the context storage

getNumApprovals().details: Returns the number of approvals required for proposal execution

getProposal(bytes32).details: Retrieves a specific proposal by ID

params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to retrieve

getProposalCount().details: Returns the total number of active proposals

getProposals(uint32,uint32).details: Returns a paginated list of active proposals

mutate(((bytes32,bytes32,uint8,bytes),by.details: Processes a signed mutation request for the proxy contract

params.signedRequest: The signed request containing the mutation action

returns._0: Optional proposal with approvals if not executed

proposalApprovalsWithSigner(bytes32).details: Returns detailed approval information for a proposal

params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to check

proposalApprovers(bytes32).details: Returns the list of addresses that have approved a specific proposal

params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to check
